snippet.title: Woman groped on Melbourne tram
snippet.content: A YOUNG woman has been groped on a tram during a brazen assault in Airport West. The victim, believed to be in her early 20s, was travelling outbound on the 59 tram last Thursday about 12pm when the unknown man approached her. The distraught woman alerted the tram driver to the assault after the offender got off the tram at the intersection of Fletcher Street, Napier Street and Mount Alexander Road, Essendon. The driver urged the woman to report the assault to police but she is yet to make that report. The man in believed to be caucasian appearance with white, balding hair and about 183cm tall with a thin build. The tram driver described the woman as being perceived to be of Asian appearance, possibly Chinese, and aged in her early 20s. Detectives from Transit Crime Investigation Unit are appealing for witnesses and urging the woman to come forward and report the matter to police.
